mapper.sql: TempId, BranchUserId, Title, Status, Count, Remark, CartId, CreateTime, NeedVerifer, Discription, TempCodeUrl, TempCodeSm, ApplyCount, Type, StyleId, MaxApplyCount, CompleteCount, MaxCompleteCount, BlessCount, IsAutoOrder, OrderHours, IsBranchAddress, BeginTime, EndTime,AmountLimit
mapper.select: select from p_myproducttemp where BranchUserId = #{branchuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and NeedVerifer=1 and Status=1 order by CreateTime desc
select a.* from p_myproducttemp a,p_myproducttempverusers b where a.TempId=b.TempId and a.NeedVerifer=1 and a.Status=1 and b.UserId=#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and b.status=1 order by a.CreateTime desc

select
from p_myproducttemp where status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and IsAutoOrder=1

update p_myproducttemp
BranchUserId = #{branchuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CartId = #{cartid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NeedVerifer = #{needverifer,jdbcType=INTEGER},

TempCodeSm = #{tempcodesm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where TempId = #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
